page.title: 18KILBURN AREA:SPORTS HALL
page.content: {SPORTS HALL The size of the{Sports Hall}is 586square metres and it is marked out for many different sports. Here are some of them; Five a side football, basketball, softball tennis, badminton, volleyball, indoor hockey and netball. The hall contains four first class indoor cricket nets and a golf driving net plus four indoor bowling rinks. Both the Sports Hall and the Gymnasium are used by many clubs and are also extensively booked for use by the public. {CHANGING ROOMS There are four{Changing Rooms}on each floor; two male and two female. Two of the changing rooms are for swimming only and have direct access to the swimming pool. Each changing room has one toilet and three showers.
